name: Solar System (itch) (gcbg)
description:
This is my Intro to Unity Solar System project! For this project, we initially modeled the solar system simply using the sun as a center, and then adding the Earth and the Moon. 

After these base elements, we were able to add more modifications of our choices. I chose to simulate the first couple planets in solar system besides Earth, which consisted of Mercury, Venus, and Mars. In addition to these three planets, I also included Mars' twin moons, Phobos and Deimos, which rotate around Mars. 

Credits

This project was created by Carter Brown for CAS 117. It was completed using course provided assets, including textures, sounds, and scripts.
